Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Ship

Interface IShip

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Ship
public interface IShip extends Serializable
Interface defining the contract for ships in the Battleship game. Extends Serializable to support game state persistence. Provides methods for managing ship position, orientation, hit tracking, and status.

    • getType

      ShipType getType()
      Returns the type of this ship.
      Returns:
      the ship type

    • getSize

      int getSize()
      Returns the size of the ship in cells.
      Returns:
      the ship size

    • getOrientation

      Orientation getOrientation()
      Returns the orientation of the ship.
      Returns:
      the ship orientation (horizontal or vertical)

    • getStartCoordinate

      Coordinate getStartCoordinate()
      Returns the starting coordinate of the ship.
      Returns:
      the starting coordinate

    • getCoordinates

      List<Coordinate> getCoordinates()
      Returns all coordinates occupied by the ship.
      Returns:
      a list of all ship coordinates

    • hit

      boolean hit(Coordinate coordinate)
      Registers a hit at the specified coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate where the hit occurred
      Returns:
      true if the hit was successful, false otherwise

    • isSunk

      boolean isSunk()
      Checks if the ship has been sunk. A ship is sunk when all of its coordinates have been hit.
      Returns:
      true if the ship is sunk, false otherwise

    • isHitAt

      boolean isHitAt(Coordinate coordinate)
      Checks if the ship has been hit at the specified coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true if the ship has been hit at this coordinate, false otherwise

    • getHitCount

      int getHitCount()
      Returns the number of times the ship has been hit.
      Returns:
      the hit count

    • setPosition

      void setPosition(Coordinate coordinate, Orientation orientation)
      Sets the position and orientation of the ship. Calculates all coordinates occupied by the ship.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the starting coordinate for the ship
      orientation - the orientation of the ship (horizontal or vertical)
